name: Dresoo – outfit builder for WooCommerce
author: Dresoo

sections.installation:
Admin Steps:

  • add products and variations
  • create a “builder” page
  • add a group to the page and put the lower and upper blocks
  • a menu with product categories should exist

For more options, please visit the admin settings page.
sections.description:
Transfer your store into a dressing room. This plugin will extend your store into a place where users can find, create, mix and match outfits based on the available products. This extension will bring more orders into play!

Do you own a Woocomerce store?

Then this plugin might help a lot. It extends the basic workflow of the store to a dressing game, similar to those aged dress-up games. Users can mix and match the upper and lower part to create a perfect outfit.
Be part of the web store’s evolution, where clients can see all the product outfits. The only requirement is that the main product image is transparent.

How does it work?

Create a page for the outfit builder, then add the upper and load part blocks inside a group. Optionally you can choose a product category for those parts.

FEATURES

  • DRAG AND DROP -> Drag and drop the upper and lower products to match the outfit
  • LEFT MENU -> Left menu with quick product category access both on mobile and desktop.
  • RIGHT MENU -> To navigate and filter the category products.

NEW FEATURES WANTED?

If you need more features, leave us feedback. We might develop that feature in the following versions just for you!

Please have a look in realtime DEMO.
